divs: Sighting DetailsWas Walking from the barn to the house with my mom and we saw a bright light come up from the horizion about the size of my pinkey finger nail at arms leinght the light rose up fast and then hovered for 3 to 5 sce and then disapeared , I then went in the house for 15 to 20 sce and when I came out I saw another light just north of where I saw the fost one it rose fast hovered for 5 or so sec and then went in a sraight line away form me fast but staied above the horizion untill it blended in with the stars . At the time there was 5 or more palnes in the sky at verring distance, none looked any thing like eather one , there color that I can colsely describe is that of the red-orange of hot steal or hot caols ina fire ,My mom asked me what it was I said I have no idea , I have seen a few other strang thing in the sky so I have a habit of looking when I am outside , every one that I have seen in in the same genral eara of the sky this is the 4 or 5 UFO I have seen this year alone

Summary: Two bright Orange Red light in sky
